verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> Jethro, <S%H3503><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> for Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and for Israel <S%H3478><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had brought <S%H3318><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

Then Jethro, <S%H3503><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Zipporah, <S%H6855><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had sent <S%H7964><s%> her back,

And her two <S%H8147><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Gershom; <S%H1648><s%> for he said, <S%H559><s%> I have been <S%H1961><s%> an alien <S%H1616><s%> in a strange <S%H5237><s%> land: <S%H776><s%>

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> was Eliezer; <S%H461><s%> for the God <S%H430><s%> of my father, <S%H1><s%> said he, was my help, <S%H5828><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from the sword <S%H2719><s%> of Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%>

And Jethro, <S%H3503><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he encamped <S%H2583><s%> at the mount <S%H2022><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I your father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> Jethro <S%H3503><s%> am come <S%H935><s%> to you, and your wife, <S%H802><s%> and her two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> with her.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7125><s%> his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> and did obeisance, <S%H7812><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him; and they asked <S%H7592><s%> each other <S%H7453><s%> of their welfare; <S%H7965><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the tent. <S%H168><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> his father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and to the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> for Israel's <S%H3478><s%> sake, <S%H182><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the travail <S%H8513><s%> that had come <S%H4672><s%> on them by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and how the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5337><s%> them.

And Jethro <S%H3503><s%> rejoiced <S%H2302><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the goodness <S%H2896><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had delivered <S%H5337><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And Jethro <S%H3503><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has delivered <S%H5337><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than all <S%H3605><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> for in the thing <S%H1697><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> he was above <S%H5921><s%> them.

And Jethro, <S%H3503><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> for God: <S%H430><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> from the morning <S%H1242><s%> to the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

And when Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> that you do <S%H6213><s%> to the people? <S%H5971><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> you yourself <S%H859><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> stand <S%H5324><s%> by you from morning <S%H1242><s%> to even? <S%H6153><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to me to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> they have <S%H1961><s%> a matter, <S%H1697><s%> they come <S%H935><s%> to me; and I judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> one <S%H376><s%> and another, <S%H7453><s%> and I do make <S%H5414><s%> them know <S%H3045><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and his laws. <S%H8451><s%>
And Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, The thing <S%H1697><s%> that you do <S%H6213><s%> is not good. <S%H2896><s%>

You will surely wear <S%H5034><s%> away, both <S%H1571><s%> you, and this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that is with you: for this thing <S%H1697><s%> is too heavy <S%H3515><s%> for you; you are not able <S%H3201><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> it yourself alone. <S%H905><s%>

Listen <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> to my voice, <S%H6963><s%> I will give you counsel, <S%H3289><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> shall be with you: Be you for the people <S%H5971><s%> to God-ward, <S%H4136><s%> <S%H430><s%> that you may bring <S%H935><s%> the causes <S%H1697><s%> to God: <S%H430><s%>

And you shall teach <S%H2094><s%> them ordinances <S%H2706><s%> and laws, <S%H8451><s%> and shall show <S%H3045><s%> them the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they must walk, <S%H3212><s%> and the work <S%H4639><s%> that they must do. <S%H6213><s%>

Moreover you shall provide <S%H2372><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> able <S%H2428><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> such as fear <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of truth, <S%H571><s%> hating <S%H8130><s%> covetousness; <S%H1215><s%> and place <S%H7760><s%> such over <S%H5921><s%> them, to be rulers <S%H8269><s%> of thousands, <S%H505><s%> and rulers <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> rulers <S%H8269><s%> of fifties, <S%H2572><s%> and rulers <S%H8269><s%> of tens: <S%H6235><s%>

And let them judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> seasons: <S%H6256><s%> and it shall be, that every <S%H3605><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%> they shall bring <S%H935><s%> to you, but every <S%H3605><s%> small <S%H6996><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%> they shall judge: <S%H8199><s%> so shall it be easier <S%H7043><s%> for yourself, and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the burden with you.

If <S%H518><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you so, then you shall be able <S%H3201><s%> to endure, <S%H5975><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> shall also <S%H1571><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to their place <S%H4725><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%>
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he had said. <S%H559><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> chose <S%H977><s%> able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and made <S%H5414><s%> them heads <S%H7218><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> rulers <S%H8269><s%> of thousands, <S%H505><s%> rulers <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> rulers <S%H8269><s%> of fifties, <S%H2572><s%> and rulers <S%H8269><s%> of tens. <S%H6235><s%>

And they judged <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> seasons: <S%H6256><s%> the hard <S%H7186><s%> causes <S%H1697><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> but every <S%H3605><s%> small <S%H6996><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%> they judged <S%H8199><s%> themselves. <S%H1992><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> let his father <S%H2859><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> depart; <S%H7971><s%> and he went <S%H3212><s%> his way into <S%H413><s%> his own land. <S%H776><s%>
